author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves blocking external URLs that are identified as malicious or suspicious. It is a proactive measure to prevent unauthorized access and mitigate potential threats from external sources. This capability can be implemented through web filtering, firewall rules, or other network security tools to ensure that traffic to these URLs is denied.

requirements.description: Authority and access permissions to implement containment measures.
Technical capability and tools to execute containment actions effectively.
Procedures to validate containment effectiveness and monitor for bypass attempts.
Network monitoring tools and access to network infrastructure for analysis and control.

title: Block External URL

references.name: Network Security Controls and Traffic Filtering
NIST SP 800-41 Rev. 1: Guidelines for Firewall and Network Security
